name: Skeletons Don't Need Hearts (Or Do They?)
name_original: Skeletons Don't Need Hearts (Or Do They?)
description:
Sneak up on skeletons and bump them to make them drop their hearts. Don't let aggro skeletons touch you or you'll lose heart stuff. If you fill up your heart meter, you win! If you empty your heart meter, you lose. 

Use the left and right arrow keys to move, up arrow  or spacebar to jump.

Music graciously provided by A New Low. 

All ugly sprites, bad sound effects, and bugs are by me.

The fine print:

In addition to the awesome Godot engine, I built this thing with:

  • Aseprite: for all my goofy pixel art
  • Audacity: for general audio editing and making my voice sound like a skeleton
  • Bfxr: for generating bloopy bleeps
  • Font is Romance Fatal Pix
  • The Waypoint Discord crew: encouragement
